title: Platinum 1 Ranked Team - LF TOP!
body:
Hey guys,

A couple of IRL mates and I have a platinum 1 team with like 30 games or so. We are looking for a new top as our top doesn't get along with certain people and doesn't use comms.

We're a bunch of 18-19 year olds that drink alot of beer and talk shit alot so if you feel like you fit in give us a message, we want soloq rank of over plat 2+ will be lenient if you're bearable and plat 3.

Feel free to add me in game and we'll play a rank or 2 with you and if we like you, you can stay.

Nothing professional just enjoyin ourselves. cheers
